mapper.select: SELECT A.CUST_ID, SUBSTR(A.CUST_CODE,1,6) AS CUST_CODE, A.CUST_NAME, A.BIZ_REGNO, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NAME, '2' AS ORDER_NUM, A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS CARE_EDATE_DDAY, A.BIRTH_DATE, H.CONT_SEQ, (CASE WHEN H.CANCEL_DATE IS NULL AND (A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))) >=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS SORT_ORDER, CASE WHEN A.END_DATE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) >= 0 THEN A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))||'일 전' ELSE (A.END_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')))*-1||'일 후' END END AS MANAGE_STATUS FROM CODE_CUST A LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE_DEPT B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE_CUSTPROTECTOR P ON (A.CUST_ID = P.CUST_ID AND A.PRO_SEQ = P.PRO_SEQ) JOIN CODE_CUSTINDEPT D ON A.CUST_ID = D.CUST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT S.CUST_ID, S.DEPT_ID, S.CONT_SDATE, S.CONT_EDATE, S.CARE_SDATE, S.CARE_EDATE, S.CONT_SEQ, S.CANCEL_DATE FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT S WHERE S.CONT_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T.CONT_SEQ) FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT T WHERE T.CUST_ID = S.CUST_ID) ) H ON (A.CUST_ID = H.CUST_ID) WHERE A.CLIENT_DIV = 'O' AND D.DEPT_ID like #{deptId} AND (A.CUST_ID like #{custId} or A.CUST_NAME like #{custId}) AND (#{custId} <> '%' OR #{alldate} = 'Y' OR ( (H.CANCEL_DATE IS NULL OR H.CANCEL_DATE > #{startDate}) AND (NVL(A.START_DATE,TO_DATE('19000101')) <= #{endDate} AND NVL(A.END_DATE,TO_DATE('29991231')) >= #{startDate}) AND ((H.CONT_SDATE <= #{endDate} AND H.CONT_EDATE >= #{startDate}) OR (H.CUST_ID IS NULL))) ) ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ASC, CUST_NAME

SELECT A.CUST_ID, B.CUST_NAME, B.CUST_CODE as CUST_CODE, B.PHONE as PHONE, B.HP as HP, B.ADDR1 as ADDR1, B.ADDR2 as ADDR2, A.CONT_SEQ, A.MANAGE_NO, A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV, (SELECT M_LIMIT_AMT FROM TABLE(FN_GS_GET_CARE_BASIC_AMT(A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV, A.APP_RATE_DIV))) AS M_LIMIT_AMT, A.CARE_SDATE, A.CARE_EDATE, A.MASTER_PLAN, A.CONT_SDATE, A.CONT_EDATE, A.PRO_SEQ, A.PRO_NAME, A.RELATION_DIV, E.COMDIV_NAME AS RELATION_DIV_NAME, P.ZIP_CODE AS PRO_ZIP_CODE, P.ADDR1 AS PRO_ADDR1, P.ADDR2 as PRO_ADDR2, P.PHONE as PRO_PHONE, P.HP as PRO_HP , P.EMAIL as PRO_EMAIL, A.MEMBER_ID, A.REG_DATE, A.DEPT_ID, D.DEPT_NAME, A.CHANGE_DATE, A.CHANGE_REASON, A.CHANGE_ID, A.CHANGE_DATETIME, A.CANCEL_DATE, A.CANCEL_REASON, A.CANCEL_ID, A.CANCEL_DATETIME, A.SERVICE_CONT_DIV, A.INTRO_ID, A.REDUCTION_DIV, A.REQ_LIMIT_AMT, A.OFFICE_AMT, A.APP_RATE_DIV, B.ZIP_CODE, A.MANAGE_NO1, A.MANAGE_NO2, B.BIRTH_DATE, A.CONT_DEPT_DIV, A.CONT_CALC_DAY, A.CONT_NOTI_DAY, A.CONT_PAY_DAY, A.CONT_WRITE_DAY, A.CONT_PAY_METHOD, A.CONT_DATE, A.CONT_MEMBER_NAME, A.CONT_WRITE_DATE FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT A, CODE_CUST B, CODE_DEPT D, CODE_CUSTPROTECTOR P, (SELECT A.COMDIV_CODE, A.COMDIV_NAME FROM CODE_COMDIV A WHERE A.COMSEC_CODE = '0116' AND A.USE_YN LIKE 'Y') E WHERE A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID(+) AND A.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID(+) AND A.CUST_ID = P.CUST_ID(+) AND A.PRO_SEQ = P.PRO_SEQ(+) AND A.RELATION_DIV = E.COMDIV_CODE(+) AND A.CUST_ID = #{custId} ORDER BY B.CUST_NAME, A.CUST_ID, A.CONT_SEQ DESC, A.CONT_SDATE

SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NAME, A.MEMBER_ID, C.NAME as MEMBER_NAME, A.PLAN_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.PLAN_DATE,'DY') AS DAY_NM, A.START_TIME_DIV||':'||A.START_MIN_DIV as START_TIME, A.END_TIME_DIV||':'||A.END_MIN_DIV as END_TIME, A.SERVICE_MIN, A.PRODUCT_ID, E.PRODUCT_CODE, E.PRODUCT_NAME, A.SERVICE_AMT, A.PAY_AMT, A.REQ_AMT, A.REMAIN_AMT, A.CUST_ID, D.CUST_CODE as ENC_CUST_CODE, D.CUST_NAME, A.REMARK, A.SERVICE_YN, A.WON_MEMBER_ID, A.COMPLAIN_MEMO, A.CARER_MEMO, A.ENTER_ID, A.ENTER_DATE, A.EDIT_ID, A.EDIT_DATE, A.SMS_YN, A.STATUS, A.CARER_MEMOYN, A.CARER_DATE, A.DEPT_MEMOYN, A.DEPT_DATE, A.SERVICE_YN_DIV, A.SERVICE_REMARK, A.DUPLISERVICE_YN, A.S_ID, A.DISCOUNT_AMT FROM SERVICE_SCHEDULE A, CODE_DEPT B, CODE_MEMBER C, CODE_CUST D, CODE_PRODUCT E WHERE A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID(+) AND A.MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID(+) AND A.CUST_ID = D.CUST_ID(+) AND A.PRODUCT_ID = E.PRODUCT_ID(+) AND A.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND A.CUST_ID like #{custId} AND A.PLAN_DATE between #{startDate} and #{endDate} ORDER BY A.PLAN_DATE, A.START_TIME_DIV, A.START_MIN_DIV

SELECT A.CUST_ID, A.CONT_SEQ, A.PLAN_SEQ, A.MON_YN, A.TUE_YN, A.WED_YN, A.THU_YN, A.FRI_YN, A.SAT_YN, A.SUN_YN, A.FROM_HOUR, A.FROM_MIN, A.TO_HOUR, A.TO_MIN, A.WEEK_YN, A.WEEK2_YN, A.MONTH_YN FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT_PLAN A WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND A.CONT_SEQ = #{contSeq} ORDER BY A.PLAN_SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE SERVICE_CONTRACT A SET CONT_EDATE = (SELECT MIN(B.CONT_SDATE) - 1 FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT B WHERE A.CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID AND B.CONT_SEQ > A.CONT_SEQ) WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} AND CONT_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(CONT_SEQ) FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} AND CONT_SEQ < #{contSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(CONT_SEQ),0) + 1 AS NSEQ FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId}

SELECT A.CUST_CODE, A.CUST_NAME, A.CUST_ID, A.HP, A.PHONE, A.ZIP_CODE, A.ADDR1, A.ADDR2, A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV, A.APP_RATE_DIV, A.REDUCTION_DIV, A.MANAGE_NO, A.MANAGE_NO1, A.MANAGE_NO2, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, B.PRO_SEQ, B.PRO_NAME, B.PHONE, B.HP, B.RELATION_DIV, (SELECT C.COMDIV_NAME FROM CODE_COMDIV C WHERE C.COMDIV_CODE = B.RELATION_DIV AND C.COMSEC_CODE = '0116') AS RELATION_DIV_NAME FROM CODE_CUST A LEFT JOIN CODE_CUSTPROTECTOR B ON B.CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID AND B.PRO_SEQ = A.PRO_SEQ WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId}

SELECT A.CUST_ID, '19' || SUBSTR(A.CUST_CODE, 1, 2) ||'-'||SUBSTR(A.CUST_CODE, 3, 2)||'-'||SUBSTR(A.CUST_CODE, 5, 2) AS BIRTH, A.CUST_CODE, A.CUST_NAME, A.DEPT_ID, A.ZIP_CODE ||') '|| A.ADDR1 ||' '|| A.ADDR2 AS ADDRESS, A.HP, A.PHONE, A.MANAGE_NO, (SELECT COMDIV_NAME FROM CODE_COMDIV B WHERE A.CUST_LEVEL_DIV=B.COMDIV_CODE AND B.COMSEC_CODE='0125') AS CUST_LEVEL_NAME FROM CODE_CUST A WHERE A.CUST_ID = #{custId}
